00021 class access
00022   {
00023   public:
00024   
00025   //! internal function to allow modification of data declared as read-only
00026   template<typename T1> arma_inline static T1& rw(const T1& x) { return const_cast<T1&>(x); }
00027 
00028   //! internal function to obtain the real part of either a plain number or a complex number
00029   template<typename eT> arma_inline static const eT& tmp_real(const eT&              X) { return X;        }
00030   template<typename  T> arma_inline static const   T tmp_real(const std::complex<T>& X) { return X.real(); }
00031
